description:
Join the Kalguuran Expedition to unearth ancient foes and valuable rewards.

This is the default Path of Exile league.

Join the Kalguuran Expedition to unearth ancient foes and valuable rewards.

A character killed in Hardcore Expedition becomes a Standard character.

rules.name: Harsh death experience penalty
rules.description: Increases the death experience penalty by 30% on all difficulty levels.

rules.name: Hostile by default
rules.description: Non-partymembers are hostile by default when you are not partied.

rules.name: Death penalty awarded to slayer
rules.description: When killing a player, their death penalty is awarded to the player doing the killing.

rules.name: Increased player caps
rules.description: Doubles player capacity in non-town instances. Does not increase the party size.
